attributes.action: Reprimand MP Iris Robinson on her recent comments about Homosexuality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP for Strangford has recently suggested that all homosexuals should receive psychiatric treatment to help "cure" them. These comments are not fitting of a MLA let alone an MP. They show narrow minded views and the belief that in Northern Ireland that bigotry is acceptable.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reprimand MP Iris Robinson on her recent comments about Homosexuality."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16526

Prime Minister's Office
